channel.title: ! i cant ~compile~! it gives me a error! any tips?
channel.description:
ok i cant compile ...when ever i try to it gives me this message "javac is not recognized as a internal or external command, operable program or batch file press any key to continue....."
if you know how to fix the problem plz help
ty lobo

item.title: ! i cant ~compile~! it gives me a error! any tips?
item.dc:creator: @ho_oh_2000 ho oh 2000
item.description:
@ho_oh_2000 wrote:

[code]Ok… Goto your compiler. Right Click it and click Edit.

Now put this in place of it.

Code:
@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe” server
pause

If the problem persists goto the tutorial section and llok at the make your own server guides. [/code]

now mine just says cannot find the path specified please help!

Read full topic
item.source: ! i cant ~compile~! it gives me a error! any tips?

item.title: ! i cant ~compile~! it gives me a error! any tips?
item.dc:creator: @Cameron Cameron
item.description:
@Cameron wrote:

Ok… Goto your compiler. Right Click it and click Edit.

Now put this in place of it.

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE Server
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server
pause

If the problem persists goto the tutorial section and llok at the make your own server guides.
